column5: was looking to hit Bayfront park in Hamilton early tomorrow for bass/panfish, but have never been in the am before. there is that big gate at the entrance to the park. do they close/open it? is it open all the time? was looking to go fairly early but I don't want to get there too early and not be able to park inside yet.  does anyone know?  thanks.
Which gates?Ive never seen a gate at the bay street entrance.Over by the leander they do close those gates.

I could have sworn there used to be a long triangular gate there years ago. however, i was looking at current pics of the entrance of the park and there is no more gate there. LOL.  never mind then  I will post a report tomorrow!
Boat ramp is open all the time, and access formembers, to Macassa Bay Yacht club as well, as many people live on the boats for the summer. Have at it.
its all free access to the area. only the private marinas and boat docks are restricted for access. tons of shore area to fish and a free boat launch
